item.title: Need help with spawn command
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“imback4more, post:5, topic:534562”]HEHEHE IT"S OK NOW! I found out the problem >.> I had a commands file that listed from regular players to donors lastly mods+ and so on. When i put this at the top of my commands file with the other regular player commands. It worked :eek: I’m like… :palm: I notice this…and forgot about it…LOOK!

/** *Owner Commands Start Here **/ public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

i put it there >.> :D! well gewdnight its 10:51pm gotta sleep and tired af^[/quote]nice you figured it, but plz use array

/** *Owner Commands Start Here **/ public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

item.title: Need help with spawn command
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

IT doesn’t look good but use array and loop plz:(, god i did it for you sorry for fudgeed identation and that, i did it on notepad, too lazy to format it.[code]private int maxpkerItems[] = {4151, 11696, 11724, 11726, 10828, 6585, 6737, 11732, 11283, 7462, 1052};

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“maxpker”) && c.playerRights == 0) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
for(int i = 0; i < maxpkerItems.length; i++) {
c.getItems().addItem(maxpkerItems[i], 1);
}
}[/code]

but elaborate ur problem i dont understand it.

EDIT: i get it, post ur whole file.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with spawn command

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

What base + revision are you using?

I know in some of the higher revisions, commands are split up by player rights like mod commands, admin commands, etc.

Post your entire commands file (paste it here).

item.title: Need help with spawn command
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

so i found a command that allows u to spawn items in your inventory with a certain type of command,but it doesnt work unless your either donor,super,or extreme…not even mods+ and regular players can obtain it.And i tried making it a owners only command still didn’t work.But i had no errors and i checked spaces to see if i did too much or less.No errors were showed in the compiler,but still don’t work.HELP! THX!

The original command

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("maxpker")) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11696, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11724, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11726, 1); c.getItems().addItem(10828, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6585, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6737, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11732, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11283, 1); c.getItems().addItem(7462, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1052, 1); }

That’s what i tried to get other players to use the command tried the other ranks,still nothing

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("maxpker") && c.playerRights == 0) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11696, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11724, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11726, 1); c.getItems().addItem(10828, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6585, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6737, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11732, 1); c.getItems().addItem(11283, 1); c.getItems().addItem(7462, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1052, 1); }

I just changed it to this…Because my regular players command works for thier lvl ids with this command and i copy pasted for the spawning command and still its only for donors and mods+ cant do it

Read full topic
